full_summary:
### Contract Notice

#### Title (Français/English)
étalonnage et support des systèmes de mesure SPEAG/ Calibration and support of the SPEAG measurement systems

#### Reference Number
PW-23-01029898

#### Solicitation Number
ISED206756

#### Publication Date
March 13, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
March 30, 2023, at 15:00:00

#### Tender Status
Expired

### Contract Details

The Government of Canada intends to contract for the calibration and support of the SPEAG measurement systems .

* **GSIN Class**:
 Numerical Identification: N6625
 Description (English): Electrical and Electronic Properties Measuring and Testing Instruments
 Description (French): Instruments de mesure et d'essai de propriétés électriques et électroniques

* **Procurement Category**:
 Category Code: GD
 Notice Type (English): Advance Contract Award Notice
 Notice Type (French): Préavis d’attribution du contrat

* **Trade Agreements**:
 This procurement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
 Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
 World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
 Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
 Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
 Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement 
 Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
 Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
 Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
 Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

* **Regions of Opportunity**:
 National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**
 Industry Canada

#### Contact Information
Name: Villeneuve, John
 Email: [john.villeneuve@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:john.villeneuve@ised-isde.gc.ca)
 Phone: (343) 571-6760

### Tender Description
Contractors are required to provide calibration and support for the SPEAG measurement systems.

In accordance with the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) if applicable, the following information must be included in the contract description:
Estimated quantity of commodity: 1
Duration of contract: 
Start Date: April 1, 2023
End Date: March 31, 2028
Time frame of delivery: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2028. Any additional conditions for participation must be included.  I
